Class Asta4dServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • com.astamuse.asta4d.web.servlet.Asta4dServlet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpringInitializableServlet

    public class Asta4dServlet
extends HttpServlet
    Here we are going to implement a view first mechanism of view resolving. We need a url mapping algorithm too.
